examples: What kind of problem ?: Other Describe your issue: I have another Canva Pro account and I want to upgrade this to Canva for free. Can I get the money back from this cancellation? From the other account we have already paid for the Canva Pro as well. The other account is<EMAIL> Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Can you please cancel my pro subscription and refund the charge from today - I was shocked to see it come up and I havent used it since sign up and have no need for this upgrade.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I did not want to upgrade and pay for the year, please let me know how to refund and get my money back! I do not want the annual upgrade! I love the free version!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I was charged for the upgrade to Canva Pro and did not authorize this transaction. I don't use it enough and don't have the funds to upgrade to Canva Pro. Would like a refund of $119.40 for this transaction. Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello,

I signed up for a Yearly Pro account on 1/30 through the iOS App and was charged $119.40 under Invoice # <NUMBER>. However, it’s been in stuck pending status and my account was never upgraded to Pro. So, I went ahead and upgraded again, but this time through your website and not through the iOS App under Invoice #  <NUMBER>. Seems like this worked. Please cancel and refund me for Invoice # <NUMBER>.

Thank you,
<NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I didn't upgrade my Canva subscription but was still charged $16.99. I would like a refund

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi There 
I unfortunately missed the cancellation date on my Canva Pro upgrade due to family health issues.
I have done so now as I haven't used the functionality and wondering whether you would be kind enough to provide a refund?
Many thanks
<NAME>

What kind of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: Hello, I received an invoice for upgrading my membership to pro. However, I did not provide the upgrade. Therefore, I will ask for your help for the cancellation of the membership and the refund. I would be glad if you can give detailed information on the subject.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I had cancelled my membership as I do not need the paid version and it still charged me for the upgrade. Can you please help me fix my account?

What kind of problem is it ?: Other Describe the problem: Hi, on December 31st I was automatically upgraded to a subscription without prior notice. They responded saying that they would refund me but I have not received anything yet. I need the money. Can you give me an answer? Otherwise I will contact consumer defense

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Not letting me use Canva pro even though I upgraded and was charged

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I upgraded to canvas pro on accident using the wrong card!!! please refund!!!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I was charged $12.95 for Canva Pro today but did not upgrade to pro. I should only have the free version. I do not know why this has been charged.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I received a Canva Upgrade Invoice. Did not intend to sign up as my work has the premium account which I have access to. Would like to request a refund for the amount withdrawn from my PayPal account yesterday.

What kind of problem?: Andet

Beskriv dit problem: I regret the upgrade to pro account. I clicked too fast. I did not use it. What should i do?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: My issue is that I payed for canva pro for two months and it does not say upgraded or has any pro items been available to me.  I would like a refund

What do you need help with?: I want to opt out of the premium membership trial.
I do not wish to become a premium member. Please put my account back to the free account. My rial should be up by now and I won't be upgrading to the Canva Pro.

Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have been charged 167 USD for this 4 in 1 special offer in Canva. till date I  did not get the upgrade and I actually want my money back. I do not even have a way of attaching copy of my paypal to show you. Please help

What was the problem you had ?: Canva Pro Describe the problem: The upgrade amount was deducted from my card on January 19 and I am unable to use it, it is as if I did not have the upgrade. I need to finish a job now and I am hurt. How to proceed?

What do you need help with?: Hello, I upgraded my account to Canva  pro on 12/24/20, and I still have not been able to access the upgrade. I Reported the issue the same way as I’m doing right now, and I received an email from your company asking for documentation showing proof that I upgraded my account. I provided that information and I still have not seen any corrections made to my account. I am getting very frustrated that I have paid for a service that I CANNOT even use!! It is going on two weeks and I have not heard back from your company. If you guys do not want to correct the matter please kindly refund me my money. The request ID number at the time was <NAME>>ID-oprsog. Please let me know if I need to provide you guys with the documentation AGAIN.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi,

I received a bill from Canva. However, I don’t remember upgrading my account to the paid account. Can you please help and cancel my subscription? Thanks :)

What do you need help with?: I want to keep my free account. I tried the trial upgrade which expires soon. I cannot upgrade at this time. Please cancel my trial upgrade immediately so I don’t get billed or charged for the upgraded membership. Thank you. I did not see anywhere on this page to do this without submitting this letter. I hope you cancel fast so I don’t get charged. I cannot afford to have this extra bill at this time. Please cancel immediately. Thx!!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: upgrading to pro, seems i tried many times and it stopped accepting my payment terms

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am trying to upgrage my free account to the Pro version and I keep getting an error message: "An error occurred while trying to subscribe" I was previously subscribed to Pro but didn't renew and now would like to. Need this upgraded ASAP please. Thanks!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Trying to upgrade to Pro and entered card info and screen froze. Closed out of Canva and went back to try again and it says " Another Subscription currently pending. Please try again later."

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello. I am not sure that I plan to use the upgraded version this year. So I would like the auto payment turned off. Thanks.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Incorrect billing. I didn’t upgrade to Canva pro and have been billed.

What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: I am using canva for free. However I received a charge. I haven't upgraded to canva PRO. what would be the reason for the charge? how do I cancel? Thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Still can't pay for Canva pro. I reached out a couple days ago and haven't heard back. I really need my upgrade back. I was paying $9.95, and now it's saying $12.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: On Canva Pro trial and would like to upgrade to Pro before trial ends but option does not appear to be available before 23rd Feb 2021.

Describe your issue: I paid 2 times for my Pro subscription! and I can’t still using the upgrades.  Appears in the app has it I didn’t pay the upgrading. 

What kind of problem?: Other

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I was charged for pro but it did not update my account .  I see please upgrade.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I thought I had Canva Pro.  I did the free trial and then decided to upgrade.  I was charged last month, but now I can't use the Canva Pro features.  I just wanted to make sure that was what I had because I need to use this for my business.
Reason for cancellation: Trial period only What would you like to create next ?: Upgrade to the free version of Canva

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am trying to cancel my upgraded Canva membership before I’m billed but I can’t. Can you please do it. Every time I click on it it just looks like it’s loading and nothing happens. I have been trying for 2 days now.

What kind of problem?: אחר

תאר את <NAME>: Hi, I did upgrade to CANVA PRO and I do not see the charge or it works, can you tell me if I'm upgraded? If not I will do again.

Describe your issue: I want cancel my trial to upgrade to canva pro

What would you like to create next ?: Upgrade to the free version of Canva Reason for canceling: I want to return for free

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I've got canva pro but unable to use the features. I have tried cancelling and re-subscribing, adding card details again, and get an error message when I try to upgrade to canva pro

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I do not want to upgrade to pro. I don't use this program enough to make it worthwhile. I tried changing it by cancelling, but that option is greyed out. Please don't charge my card.
Reason for cancellation: too expensive What would you like to create next ?: Upgrade to the free version of Canva

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi,
I've been trying to upgrade to canva pro, but my payment keep getting declined. What could be the cause please?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Getting charged. No upgraded access. Only have basic access. Want refund for 3 months.
Reason for cancellation: Not useful for my use. What would you like to create next ?: Upgrade to the free version of Canva
What do you need help with?: why am I always asked to upgrade to  Pro - I am already trialling Pro
What do you need help with?: I paid for the subscription and the app is not letting me use the upgrade
Reason for cancellation: Budget What would you like to create next ?: Upgrade to the free version of Canva
